com.mygdx.game.View.Screens

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.mygdx.game.View.Screens.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameView
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    A view representing the game screen. Draws all the other views and controls the camera.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera
      The camera used to show the viewport.
      private static boolean DEBUG_PHYSICS
      Used to debug the position of the physics fixtures
      private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4 debugCamera
      The transformation matrix used to transform meters into pixels in order to show fixtures in their correct places.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Box2DDebugRenderer debugRenderer
      A renderer used to debug the physical fixtures.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont Font
      a font for drawing the score
      private AliensGame game
      The game this screen belongs to.
      static int PANEL_HEIGHT
      the panel height
      static int PANEL_WIDTH
      the panel width
      static float PIXEL_TO_METER
      How much meters does a pixel represent.
      private static float VIEWPORT_WIDTH
      The width of the viewport in meters.
